MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a unplanned power cut in the LL17 postcode area of St Asaph, affecting properties in Lower Denbigh Road, Penrhewl, Ruby Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 01.25am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extensive repairs required to our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08.33am on 15th April 2021.
